welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Villa Sarmiento, Argentina! Known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals, we hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Argentina.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main international terminal, handling most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Domestic terminal, handling domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Secondary international terminal, handling overflow flights and some low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, additional time can be purchased.
